data.text: Iyi ndi miyambo inanso ya Solomoni, imene anthu a Hezekiya mfumu ya ku Yuda analemba.
Ulemerero wa Mulungu uli pa kubisa zinthu;
Monga momwe kwatalikira kumwamba ndi momwe kulili kuzama kwa dziko lapansi,
Chotsa zoyipa mʼsiliva
Chotsa munthu woyipa pamaso pa mfumu;
Usamadzikuze ukakhala pamaso pa mfumu,
paja ndi bwino kuti mfumu ichite kukuwuza kuti, “Bwera pamwamba pano,”
usafulumire kupita nacho ku bwalo la milandu
Kamba mlandu ndi mnansi wako,
kuopa kuti wina akamva mawu ako adzakuchititsa manyazi
Mawu amodzi woyankhulidwa moyenera
Kwa munthu womvetsa bwino, kudzudzula kwa munthu wanzeru kuli ngati ndolo zagolide
Wamthenga wodalirika ali ngati madzi ozizira pa nthawi yokolola
Munthu wonyadira mphatso imene sayipereka
Kupirira ndiye kumagonjetsa mfumu,
Ngati upeza uchi, ingodya okukwanira,
Uzipita kamodzikamodzi ku nyumba ya mnzako
Munthu wochitira mnzake umboni wonama,
Kudalira munthu wosankhulupirika pa nthawi ya mavuto,
Kuyimbira nyimbo munthu wachisoni
Ngati mdani wako ali ndi njala, mupatse chakudya kuti adye;
Pochita izi, udzamusenzetsa makala a moto pa mutu pake,
Monga momwe mphepo yampoto imabweretsera mvula,
Nʼkwabwino kukhala pa ngodya ya denga
Mthenga wabwino wochokera ku dziko lakutali
Munthu wolungama amene amagonjera munthu woyipa
Sibwino kudya uchi wambiri,
Munthu amene samatha kudziretsa
